summary: Diff introduces a LocalUpdatesPage prop for a home-navigation callback, but the provided truncated snippets do not show an actual user-visible "Back" button or confirm that App.tsx passes the callback and that LocalUpdatesPage uses it in the UI. Several unrelated features/changes were also made outside the requested back-navigation behavior.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a user-visible "Back" button on the Local Updates page that navigates the user to the Home page when clicked (accessible, English label).
missing_requirements.reason: LocalUpdatesPage defines an onBackHome prop, but the diff snippet is truncated before the rendered UI and does not show any "Back" button element (or its label/semantics) being rendered and wired to navigation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Wire Local Updates page navigation to the app-level view router so the Local Updates "Back" button can switch the current view to "home".
missing_requirements.reason: LocalUpdatesPage expects an onBackHome callback, but the App.tsx diff is truncated before the LocalUpdatesPage render, so there is no visible evidence that App passes a callback that sets the view to "home", nor that LocalUpdatesPage calls it from a Back button.

hallucinated_features.description: Runtime guard/polling to detect and recover from non-interactive UI state (pointer-events/inert) in App.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; unrelated to Local Updates back navigation.

hallucinated_features.description: New/changed React Query hooks including a new useUpdateStory mutation for editing stories.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest explicitly focuses only on Local Updates back navigation and states non-goals around other behavior changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Header changes: always-visible Local Updates button and user dropdown navigation items.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest (which only asks for a Back button on Local Updates and wiring to view state).

hallucinated_features.description: ProfileSetupModal changes to pointer-events-auto and interact-outside prevention.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; unrelated to Local Updates back navigation.
